Summary: Large circlular craft and white light over Independence, MO
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Independence
There were no other sightings in Independence on or around May 14th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsAn anonymous witness called me today at 11:40 AM: 10:30 PM Saturday: She was driving home from work when she saw a lighted craft just above the clouds over her head on Saturday night at approximately 10:32 PM over Independence, MO, South of 39th Street and Lee's Summit Rd headed in a NW-SE direction. She pulled over into a parking lot to watch it. It was not defined and difficult to see - only the large bright circluar white light was clearly visible. A faint outline of a round-shaped object could be seen through the clouds. She watched it for approximately three minutes. It moved very slowly. She got no photos. Only one witness was on the scene. The witness stated that it would take a dinner plate to cover the object, or perhaps something larger held at arm's length. It was at 90 degrees overhead when she first saw it. Note: Nine witnesses saw strange objects within a 6.5 hour period Saturday night to Sunday morning. They may be related. See my other reports.
